review: Remote auto scrolls all the way to the end of the list. Hit back and it auto scrolls to the front. Difficult to get a movie selection in the middle. Have to barely, ever so lightly push the over button to get to the next movie selection. If you give the remote a normal push it goes all the way to the end.Also remote is ultra mini. Same length as my iPhone 4 and 1/2 the width. Will go missing. Guaranteed.
